nodes.text: The Verity was a starship used by Hennix, Tai, and Voe, members of Luke Skywalker's Jedi Order. After returning to find Ben Solo outside the burning ruins of Skywalker's Jedi temple, the three Jedi used it to pursue him and seek answers regarding the death and destruction.
The Verity first appeared in the comic The Rise of Kylo Ren 1, written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Will Sliney, and published by Marvel Comics on December 18, 2019.

The Verity and the other vessels of its class was based on an unused design made for Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The concept art was created by Yanick Dusseault, and was intended for a ship used by Kira, the character that would eventually become Rey. Though the ship's model was not officially established, Soule and Sliney privately called it a "T-Wing."
